DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics metformin IR oral administration healthy elderly male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Investigate Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Metformin Elderly
DOC.criteria: Males age 6585 year body mass index ( BMI ) 1828 kg/m2 Good health base complete medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiography ( ECG ) , clinical laboratory evaluation include hematology ( blood cell count , hemoglobin , platelet count ) , liver function test ( aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , bilirubin ) , serum creatinine , blood glucose urinalysis If clinically relevant disorder Past history diabetes clinical finding suspect diabetes Abnormal clinical laboratory value ( i.e. , platelet ≤ 75,000/mm3 , hemoglobin ≤ 9 g/dL , neutrophil absolute ≤ 1000/mm3 , fast glucose > 126mg/dL , creatinine ≥ 1.5 mg/dL , AST , ALT > 3 × upper limit normal )
